attributes.action: Stop Cuts to Solar PV Feed-in Tariffs and abolish MCS
attributes.additional_details:
Households who consume less than 10kwh a day  should be encouraged to save enery and money !! Cutting the feed in tariff will do none of these things ! There are plenty of DIY'ers out there capable of installing systems that will save them money and the enviroment (I am an electronic engineer, but because I am not mcs registered, i canot benefit from feed in tariffs).
You have to ask yourselves, if the government is really interested in reducing CO2 emmissions or lining the pockets of their energy, tax generating  friends !! Abolish MCS.
